text: Club Atlético Boca Juniors () is professional football club in La Boca, a neighbourhood of Buenos Aires, Argentina. They play their home games at La Bombonera. Boca Juniors and River Plate have an intense rivalry, and matches between them are sometimes very heated. Matches between them are known as the Superclásico, and both teams are from Buenos Aires. ==Current squad== ==Honours== ===International=== * Club World Cup (3): 1977, 2000, 2003 * Copa Libertadores (6): 1977, 1978, 2000, 2001, 2003, 2007 * Copa Sudamericana (2): 2004, 2005 * Recopa Sudamericana (4): 1990, 2005, 2006, 2008 * Supercopa Sudamericana (1): 1989 * Copa de Oro (1): 1993 * Copa Master de Supercopa (1): 1992 * Tie Cup (1): 1919 * Copa de Honor Cousenier (1) : 1920 * Copa de Confraternidad Escobar-Gerona (2): 1945, 1946 ===National=== ====League==== * Primera División (34): 1919, 1920, 1923, 1924, 1926, 1930, 1931 LAF, 1934 LAF, 1935, 1940, 1943, 1944, 1954, 1962, 1964, 1965, 1969 Nacional, 1970 Nacional, 1976 Metropolitano, 1976 Nacional, 1981 Metropolitano, 1992 Apertura, 1998 Apertura, 1999 Clausura, 2000 Apertura, 2003 Apertura, 2005 Apertura, 2006 Clausura, 2008 Apertura, 2011 Apertura, 2015, 2016–17, 2017–18, 2019–20 ====National cups==== * Supercopa Argentina (1): 2018 * Copa Diego Armando Maradona (1): 2020 * Copa Argentina (3): 1969, 2012, 2015 * Copa de Competencia Jockey Club (2): 1919, 1925 * Copa Dr. Carlos Ibarguren (5): 1919, 1923, 1924, 1940, 1944 * Copa Estímulo (1): 1926 * Copa de Competencia Británica George VI (1): 1946 == Related pages == * List of Argentine football teams == References == Category:1905 establishments in Argentina
title: Boca Juniors
